item.title:
WiE has been my first choice to keep up to date with all the things happening in Ethereum in a very efficient way
not sure the reasons but we will feel a hole here
great job @evan_van_ness and team!

item.title:
Here's my 2024 Twitter Wrapped!
"You're so deep in Web3, you probably try to sign transactions to open your front door" - well not too far from reality 😆
"You've used 🚀 more times than Elon Musk this year" - I like rockets
https://twitterwrapped.exa.ai/emilianobonassi?share

item.title:
RT by @emilianobonassi: assembling a team
extensive defi experience preferred, this means having worked on a protocol with real users and TVL
looking for help with: - contracts (mainly reviewing mine but if you can contribute even better) - frontend - comms/PR/community engagement
item.dc:creator: @0xz80
item.description:
assembling a team

extensive defi experience preferred, this means having worked on a protocol with real users and TVL

looking for help with:
- contracts (mainly reviewing mine but if you can contribute even better)
- frontend
- comms/PR/community engagement

item.title:
Rollups, a GitHub perspective
Commits => Transactions
Filesystem => State Transition Function
Remote Push => DA and State Root Posting
Public Repository => Settlement layer
Everything is a rollup
item.dc:creator: @emilianobonassi
item.description:
Rollups, a GitHub perspective

Commits => Transactions

Filesystem => State Transition Function

Remote Push => DA and State Root Posting

Public Repository => Settlement layer

Everything is a rollup

nitter.poast.org/emilianobonassi/status/1870258736335597639#m

item.title:
Rollups, a gaming perspective
Moves => Transactions
Gameplay => State Transition Function
Autosaving/Checkpoints => DA and State Root Posting
Leaderboard => Settlement layer
Everything is a rollup
